type.description: Human-readable label that identifies this token filter type.

tokens.markdownDescription: List that contains the stop words that correspond to the tokens to remove. Value must be one or more stop words.
tokens.description: List that contains the stop words that correspond to the tokens to remove.

ignoreCase.markdownDescription:
Flag that indicates whether to ignore the case of stop words when filtering the tokens to remove. The value can be one of the following:

- `true` : ignore case and remove all tokens that match the specified stop words

- `false` : be case-sensitive and remove only tokens that exactly match the specified case

If omitted, defaults to `true`.
ignoreCase.description: Specify whether to ignore the case of stop words when filtering the tokens to remove.
